rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with natural light due to North-facing orientation in accordance with Vastu principles.
A multifunctional space combining living and dining areas, with flexible furniture arrangements.
Modern kitchen design, located to the South of the main living area for optimal workflow while maintaining privacy.
Adjacent to the kitchen, providing storage and utility spaces.
Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, placed in a calm corner of the layout adhering to Vastu principles.
Comfortable guest bedroom with attached small bathroom.
Additional guest bedroom to accommodate visitors.
Safe and airy children's room with vibrant decor.
A dedicated home theater area for cinematic experiences, acoustically optimized.
Additional living space on the upper level with access to the rooftop terrace.
Expansive rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and recreational space.
